description_html: Under this scheme, income support of ₹6,000 per year is provided to all farmer families across the country in three equal installments of ₹2,000 each every four months.
description_text: Under this scheme, income support of ₹6,000 per year is provided to all farmer families across the country in three equal installments of ₹2,000 each every four months.
eligibility_html: All landholding farmer families having cultivable land holding in their names either individually or jointly are eligible.
eligibility_text: All landholding farmer families having cultivable land holding in their names either individually or jointly are eligible.

description_html: The scheme aims to increase crop productivity and farmer income by providing micro irrigation facilities and promoting efficient water use.
description_text: The scheme aims to increase crop productivity and farmer income by providing micro irrigation facilities and promoting efficient water use.
eligibility_html: Small and marginal farmers in Karnataka with landholding up to 5 acres are eligible for the scheme.
eligibility_text: Small and marginal farmers in Karnataka with landholding up to 5 acres are eligible for the scheme.

description_html: This scheme provides crop insurance coverage to farmers against natural calamities, pest attacks, and diseases affecting crop yield.
description_text: This scheme provides crop insurance coverage to farmers against natural calamities, pest attacks, and diseases affecting crop yield.
eligibility_html: All farmers in Tamil Nadu who cultivate notified crops during notified seasons are eligible.
eligibility_text: All farmers in Tamil Nadu who cultivate notified crops during notified seasons are eligible.

description_html: PMFBY is a crop insurance scheme that provides financial support and insurance coverage for farmers in case of crop loss due to natural calamities, pests & diseases.
description_text: PMFBY is a crop insurance scheme that provides financial support and insurance coverage for farmers in case of crop loss due to natural calamities, pests & diseases.
eligibility_html: All farmers growing notified crops in notified areas during the season who have insurable interest on the crop are eligible.
eligibility_text: All farmers growing notified crops in notified areas during the season who have insurable interest on the crop are eligible.

description_html: Financial assistance of ₹4,000 per acre per season (maximum 2 seasons) is provided to farmers for crop cultivation expenses.
description_text: Financial assistance of ₹4,000 per acre per season (maximum 2 seasons) is provided to farmers for crop cultivation expenses.
eligibility_html: All farmers in Karnataka who own agricultural land and cultivate crops are eligible for financial assistance.
eligibility_text: All farmers in Karnataka who own agricultural land and cultivate crops are eligible for financial assistance.

scheme_name: Chief Minister's Comprehensive Crop Insurance Scheme
description_html: Comprehensive crop insurance scheme covering all major crops against weather-related losses with premium subsidy from the state government.
description_text: Comprehensive crop insurance scheme covering all major crops against weather-related losses with premium subsidy from the state government.
eligibility_html: Farmers cultivating in Tamil Nadu during kharif, rabi and summer seasons are eligible for coverage.
eligibility_text: Farmers cultivating in Tamil Nadu during kharif, rabi and summer seasons are eligible for coverage.

description_html: The scheme aims to promote soil test based nutrient management for improving productivity through soil health cards providing information on nutrient status of soil.
description_text: The scheme aims to promote soil test based nutrient management for improving productivity through soil health cards providing information on nutrient status of soil.
eligibility_html: All farmers across India are eligible to get soil health cards for their agricultural land.
eligibility_text: All farmers across India are eligible to get soil health cards for their agricultural land.

description_html: Free food grains distribution scheme providing 5kg rice per person per month to BPL families and 35kg rice per month per family.
description_text: Free food grains distribution scheme providing 5kg rice per person per month to BPL families and 35kg rice per month per family.
eligibility_html: All BPL families holding valid ration cards in Karnataka are eligible for free rice distribution.
eligibility_text: All BPL families holding valid ration cards in Karnataka are eligible for free rice distribution.
